title: MAGNETIC CIRCLE WITH NON-VERBAL HYPNOSIS
description:
In this video Dr. Marco Paret's student's will do a non-verbal hypnosis exercise, called Magnetic circle. Three subjects stand in the middle of the circle, formed by people, doing magnetic passes on them, until the three subjects enter into a deep hypnotic induction. The magnetic circle is a powerful way to hypnotize people, because the passes are done by multiple people, rather than just one.
